name: Marbly
description:
As a course project, I asked to upgrade a simple marble game. When we collect all the gems, the game was done 

I've selected a space theme for the game and enabled URP for the project so my marbles could be planets and my space-themed game would shine!

Added selecting between different planets, more models, speed up, time boost and jump pads to enhance gameplay. Added simple sounds and a AI produced music.

Lastly, I scored simple math to suit my map with lots of coins. Game is easy to complete but in order to get a high score, player needs to consider time left and coin count since both is important
